p: In scenario 2 (time-unlimited enrollment), scale-up of the CCP intervention reduced the number of new HIV infections over 20 years by 4,453 infections, versus a base case of 33,061 new HIV infections ( Fig 2A). The number of QALYs gained was 4,355. ( Table 2) The number of HIV-related deaths over 20 years was reduced by 379, versus 9,440 deaths ( Fig 2B).
